title: Subject
description: Metadata schema describing an experimental subject (e.g., mouse).

name.title: Subject Name
name.description: Common or given name used to refer to the animal(s) during the study.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifier assigned to the animal(s), used for tracking and referencing within the experiment.

cohort.title: Cohort
cohort.description: Group or batch to which the animal(s) belongs.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Source from which the animal(s) were obtained.
